attributes.action: Remove the new 'near naked' x ray body scanners on trial from all airports
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To remove these new xray near naked body scanners from airports they are a total invasion of privacy, apparently they are being manned by highly trained individuals, however, many paedophiles are also highly trained. How do we know that the images are not saved.  This is not that I have anything to hide (except my body), this is a breach of my human rights.
